ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] lute question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i can t remember the exact name, but i think i have this lute called a lisera lute (i think). i was just wondering if it was any better/worse than my
ygData.messageBody:
>
i can't remember the exact name, but i think i have this lute called a
lisera lute (i think). i was just wondering if it was any better/worse than
my present lute (plain, boring, found in any store).
>

I tried this recently, but Lisera (from Cassius at the Bard Guild in Qeynos)
is not equippable.

I completed this quest when I was level 5 and so couldn't equip the Lute if
I wanted to. I was scared out of my wits running all that way to South
Karana, and then amazed at seeing a bull elephant walk right past me.

Ahh. Happy days. :)

-KS
